name: import_best_practices
description: Epic to import and tune industry-standard prompts (Aider/Cursor) for local models.

stories.note: Validate the draft and use the 'promote_prompt' tool to save it to the core library for the Frontend Artisan.

example_task: Promote the new 'Precision Coder' prompt to the core library. TARGET SEAT: frontend_artisan. MODEL FAMILY: deepseek. Use the tool 'promote_prompt'.
